purpose: To provide a flexible framework for building and deploying AI agents that can perform a variety of tasks across different domains.
principle: Empower users to create customized AI agents that can collaborate and execute workflows effectively, leveraging modular components and integrations.
reusability: Designed with modularity in mind, allowing developers to reuse components and workflows across different AI agent projects.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may include incomplete features, potential bugs, and limited documentation. Users should expect a learning curve and the need for experimentation.
name: AgentDock
